overview: The Venice Hongwanji Buddhist Temple had an opportunity to take part in an episode of East of Main Street, an HBO documentary series that has been produced for the past three years to celebrate Asian Pacific American Heritage Month. This yearâ€™s episode, Milestones, focuses on how different groups of Asian Americans mark the milestones throughout their lives.
tagline: Life. Death. And everything in between. Celebrate America's diversity
title: East of Main Street: Milestones
